MacroOp.Name: OMNI_32BIT_QUEUE_TIMER
MacroOp.Brief: If defined, uses 32-bit types in the omni::chrono::queue_timer class.
MacroOp.Description: If defined, the omni::chrono::queue_timer class will utilize a 32-bit intergral type for its tick counter, versus a 64-bit type. The class does not allow for setting an interval greater than a 32-bit type regardless if this flag is set.
MacroOp.Notes: This is an optimization flag and does not have an effect on the classes functionality.
MacroOp.Synopsis: #define OMNI_32BIT_QUEUE_TIMER Signifies to enable the OMNI_32BIT_QUEUE_TIMER flag and utilize 32-bit types.
